Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and quality craftsmanship, it's truly a remarkable item. I believe in its value and am confident it will serve you well. For this exceptional product, I am offering it to you for $150. I understand that everyone has their own valuation, so if this price works for you, please let me know and we can proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
